thread.title: Ginger SpiceGeri Halliwell RevealsAdorable Photo of New Baby
thread.title_full: Ginger SpiceGeri Halliwell RevealsAdorable Photo of New Baby

author: InStyle Staff
title: Ginger SpiceGeri Halliwell RevealsAdorable Photo of New Baby
text:
by: InStyle Staff 
How the time flies! It seems like just yesterday that we reported the arrival of Ginger Spice Geri Halliwell’s new baby; today, the proud mom warmed our hearts with an adorable picture commemorating little Montague’s two-week birthday. 
Halliwell and husband Christian Horner look every bit the happy family as they coo over their adorable infant, full name Montague George Hector Horner (try saying that three times fast). Also pictured: a custom-embroidered bunny blankie, emblazoned with Montague’s name, dangling casually over the edge of his crib, and which we are officially declaring #nurserygoals.
